response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its value to you, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. We're offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $14,000, which we believe strikes a balance between fair compensation for us and an attractive deal for you. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 14000}
